infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator

    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements an AIS calculator using box-kernel estimation. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel as the calculator into the parent class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, with:

    • The constructor step being a simple call to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel();
    • Additional initialisation options initialise(int, double) and initialise(int, int, double); and
    • ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF as outlined in ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String))

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
